title: France panorama. [No. 70/23]
brief_description: French cinemagazine items including: 1. A new city - about a “prime example” of modern city planning in the city of Sarcelles. A city that began as a major housing project but which became a city in its own right. 2. Techniques “Expomar” - an expo of machinery and other techniques relevant to urban planning. Mirabelle - about MIR506, destined for the Soviet Union. 3. Francois Tracanelli - pole vault champion. 4. The arts: an art gallery featuring lithographs. Also featuring lithographs and sculpture of Ossip Zadkine.
